description: This file implements the DownloadManagerHttpClient class responsible for managing HTTP file downloads using libcurl, including capabilities like setting download rate limits, tracking progress, handling errors, and cleanup.

classes.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient
classes.description: Class providing HTTP download functionality including rate limiting, progress tracking, and cleanup.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::DownloadManagerHttpClient
methods.description: Constructor initializing the curl handle and setting default values.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::~DownloadManagerHttpClient
methods.description: Destructor cleaning up curl handle and releasing resources.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::downloadFile
methods.description: Method to download a file from a URL to a specified file path with optional rate limiting.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::progressCb
methods.description: Callback function to track download progress and handle cancellation.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::write_data
methods.description: Callback function to write downloaded data to a file.

methods.name: DownloadManagerHttpClient::Status downloadFile(const std::string & url,const std::string & fileName,uint32_t rateLimit)
size_t progressCb(void * ptr,double dltotal,double dlnow,double ultotal,double ulnow)
size_t write_data(void * ptr,size_t size,size_t nmemb,FILE * stream)

ctags.name: progressCb
ctags.pattern: /^size_t DownloadManagerHttpClient::progressCb(void *ptr, double dltotal, double dlnow, double ult/
